Package view

Class CommandLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.CommandLine
  • public class CommandLine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class gives the command line interface for user Every user input is retrieved and navigated to functionality

                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException

      • addInputCommandList

        public void addInputCommandList​(boolean input,
                                java.lang.String command)
        This method is used for adding the input commands one by one as the user is entering
        Parameters:
        input - this variable gives true/false for adding to inputCommandsList
        command - this variable has command name that is used for adding to inputCommandsList

        public boolean checkFileExist​(java.lang.String fileName)
        This method is used for checking if file exists or not
        Parameters:
        fileName - this variable gives the filename which user entered
        Returns:
        returns gives true/false

      • checkArmiesPlaced

        public boolean checkArmiesPlaced()
        This method is used for checking if place all command need to perform or not
        Returns:
        true if complete armies are not place; otherwise false

      • checkPlayersTurn

        public boolean checkPlayersTurn​(java.lang.String countryName)
        This method is used for checking the player's turn or not
        Parameters:
        countryName - this variable contains the name of the country
        Returns:
        this returns true when matches with current player; Otherwise false

        public java.lang.String executeBehaviour​(java.lang.String strategyName)
                                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException

        Returns:
        success if strategy executed successfully

        Returns:
        true if contains the tags else false

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • checkTournamentGamesConditions

        public boolean checkTournamentGamesConditions​(int numberOfGames)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if satisfies range else false

      • checkTournamentTurnsConditions

        This method checks for the turn conditions range
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if satisfies range else false
